ROLE_SYSTEM_DOCUMENT READONLY FOCUSABLE
    IA2_ROLE_SECTION READONLY xml-roles:banner
        ROLE_SYSTEM_TEXT name='This is a header element.' READONLY
    IA2_ROLE_SECTION READONLY xml-roles:complementary
        ROLE_SYSTEM_TEXT name='This is an aside element.' READONLY
    IA2_ROLE_SECTION READONLY xml-roles:contentinfo
        ROLE_SYSTEM_TEXT name='This is an address element.' READONLY
    IA2_ROLE_FOOTER READONLY xml-roles:contentinfo
        ROLE_SYSTEM_TEXT name='This is a footer element.' READONLY
    IA2_ROLE_SECTION READONLY xml-roles:main
        ROLE_SYSTEM_TEXT name='This is a main element.' READONLY
    IA2_ROLE_SECTION READONLY xml-roles:navigation
        ROLE_SYSTEM_TEXT name='This is a nav element.' READONLY
    ROLE_SYSTEM_APPLICATION xml-roles:application
        ROLE_SYSTEM_TEXT name='This is an ARIA application landmark.' READONLY
    IA2_ROLE_SECTION READONLY xml-roles:banner
        ROLE_SYSTEM_TEXT name='This is an ARIA banner landmark.' READONLY
    IA2_ROLE_SECTION READONLY xml-roles:complementary
        ROLE_SYSTEM_TEXT name='This is an ARIA complementary landmark.' READONLY
    IA2_ROLE_SECTION READONLY xml-roles:contentinfo
        ROLE_SYSTEM_TEXT name='This is an ARIA contentinfo landmark.' READONLY
    IA2_ROLE_SECTION READONLY xml-roles:main
        ROLE_SYSTEM_TEXT name='This is an ARIA main landmark.' READONLY
    IA2_ROLE_SECTION READONLY xml-roles:navigation
        ROLE_SYSTEM_TEXT name='This is an ARIA navigation landmark.' READONLY
    IA2_ROLE_SECTION READONLY xml-roles:search
        ROLE_SYSTEM_TEXT name='This is an ARIA search landmark.' READONLY
